name: The Event
storyline:
You wake up in an asylum with no memory of who you are or how you got there.

With the help of clues, notes and testimonies, will you be able to piece together the story of what happened to you and the people who were there the day it all happened?

Wander in the dark and find the truth.
summary: The Event is a first-person psychological horror game that offers immersive gameplay and a rich narrative. Find yourself stuck in mystery and struggle in the dark against paranormal activities, demons from other worlds and much more. Will you be able to find out the truth and return home?
